Afterwards , patient invite attend standard post-concussion management visit physical therapist FORTIUS Sport Health Burnaby BC , 48-72 hour injury . Both rest exercise group receive `` standard post-concussion management visit '' . In visit , physical measure c-spine range motion ( ROM ) , c-spine proprioception laser ( within 7 cm pas , > 7 cm fail ) , strength , presence/absence subjective symptom , numeric c-spine rating scale , neurocognitive testing complete .
